definition.procedurexml: <xml xmlns="https://developers.google.com/blockly/xml"><block type="event_trigger" deletable="false" x="40" y="40"><field name="trigger">no_ext_trigger</field><next><block type="text_print"><value name="TEXT"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">testiado</field></block></value><next><block type="controls_if"><value name="IF0"><block type="world_data_isremote"></block></value><statement name="DO0"><block type="java_code"><field name="CODE">int tileSize = 8;&#10;&#10;GameScene scene = new GameScene("scene_test");&#10;GameControls.cancelPlayerMovement = true;&#10;scene.active = true;&#10;				new GameObject(0 * tileSize, 0 * tileSize, 8, 8, "rock", scene);&#10;				new GameObject(1 * tileSize, 2 * tileSize, 8, 8, "rock", scene);&#10;				new GameObject(1 * tileSize, 3 * tileSize, 8, 8, "rock", scene);&#10;				new GameObject(6 * tileSize, 3 * tileSize, 8, 8, "pickaxe", scene);&#10;				new PlayerObject(1 * tileSize, 1 * tileSize, 8, 8, "player", scene);&#10;scene.scale = 2f;&#10;</field></block></statement></block></next></block></next></block></xml>
